## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7b2841cc52f86348bb048d0fc7dd2dba1253653dd003f68552f72f67ba3953ec)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@azet/api' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
